data.title: Rusnano Capital Mergers and Acquisitions Summary
data.meta_description: Rusnano Capital’s most recent acquisition/investment was Compass Electro Optical Systems on 2013-11-19, and its most recent exit was Uralplastic-N on 2016-07-11.
data.text:
Rusnano Capital’s most common sectors for investment arepackaging (25%) and technology hardware (25%) . The Firm’s most common investment types include buyout (lbo, mbo, mbi) (50%) and stake purchase (25%). In total, Rusnano Capital has invested in 3 different countries.

The Firm’s most common exit type is trade sale (100%). Rusnano Capital’s largest (disclosed) exit occurred in 2012 when it sold NTO IRE-Polus for $55M.
